title: client will not sync with oc6
body:
after upgrading  to oc6 the client doesn't sync to the server. 

log entry (which is repeated):

```
{"app":"php","message":"undefined index: storage_mtime at \/mnt\/www\/owncloud\/lib\/private\/files\/cache\/cache.php#178","level":2,"time":"2013-12-12t13:24:04+00:00"}
```

the client (1.5.0rc1) handshake with the server is correct. it can find the owncloud instance. it will not sync and reports:

```
csync failed to connect through a proxy. 500 internal server error.
```

server details: nas4free 
version: 9.1.0.1 - sandstorm (revision 847)
build date: sun aug 18 03:49:39 cest 2013 
platform os: freebsd 9.1-release-p5 (kern.osreldate: 901000) 
platform: x86-embedded on intel(r) pentium(r) 4 cpu 2.40ghz

running owncloud through the webserver service as provided by nas4free.
